label: auditableEvidence
comment: Auditable evidence supporting this assessment such as raw measurements, supporting documents. This is usally private data and would normally be encrypted.

rangeIncludes.comment: A binary file that is hashed ()for tamper evidence) and optionally encrypted (for confidentiality).

domainIncludes.comment: A conformity attestation issued by a competent body that defines one or more assessments (eg carbon intensity) about a product (eg batttery) against a specification (eg LCA method) defined in a standard or regulation.
